title: Judd Apatow | Trump’s Tulsa Rally Was a Flop: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump staking his political fortunes on a rally in Tulsa, Oklahoma, that turned out to be a dud.

Then, he talks to Judd Apatow about his new movie "The King of Staten Island."

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
